verbose_text: APC not only attenuates fetal neuroinflammation and the associated secondary WMI in the developing brain, but also reduces the fgl2 expression, fibrin deposition and pro inflammatory cytokine production in the placenta.
evidence: APC not only attenuates fetal neuroinflammation and the associated secondary WMI in the developing brain, but also reduces the fgl2 expression, fibrin deposition and pro-inflammatory cytokine production
